sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { View, TouchableOpacity, Image, Text,TextInput, FlatList} from 'react-native';
import styles from './styles';
import logoImg from '../../assets/logo.png';
import menuImg from '../../assets/menu.png';
import backImg from '../../assets/back.png';
import clockImg from '../../assets/relogio.png';
import calendarImg from '../../assets/calendar.png';
import peoplesImg from '../../assets/peoples.png';
import maisImg from '../../assets/mais.png';
import menosImg from '../../assets/menos.png';

export default function Detail ( {navigation} ) {
    const [products, setProducts] = useState([]);


    function navigateToDetail() {
        navigation.navigate('Eventos');
    }

    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View style={styles.header}>
                <TouchableOpacity onPress={( ) => navigation.openDrawer()}>
                    <Image style={styles.menu} source={menuImg}/>
                </TouchableOpacity>
                <Image style={styles.logo} source={logoImg}/>
                <TouchableOpacity onPress={( ) => navigateToDetail()}>
                    <Image style={styles.back} source={backImg}/>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>

            <View style={ styles.event}>
                <View style={ styles.title}>
                    <Text style={ styles.name}>LollaPalooza</Text>
                    <Text style={ styles.description}>Festival de Musica</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={ styles.info}>
                    <View style={ styles.column}>
                        <View style={ styles.details}>
                            <Image style={styles.icon} source={calendarImg}/>
                            <Text style={ styles.infos}>20/10/2020</Text>
                        </View>

                        <View style={ styles.details}>
                            <Image style={styles.icon} source={clockImg}/>
                            <Text style={ styles.infos }>16:00</Text>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                    <View style={ styles.column}>
                        <View style={ styles.details}>
                            <Image style={styles.icon} source={peoplesImg}/>
                            <Text style={ styles.infos}>100/600</Text>
                        </View>

                        <View style={ styles.details}>
                            <Image style={styles.icon} source={clockImg}/>
                            <Text style={ styles.infos}>20:00</Text>
                        </View>
                    </View>
                </View>
            </View>
            <FlatList
                    data={[1,2,3]}
                    style={styles.ticketList}
                    keyExtractor={event => String(event)}
                    showsVerticalScrollIndicator={ false }
                    renderItem={( ) => (
                        <View style={styles.ticket}>
                            <Text style={styles.descriptionTicket}>CAMAROTE VIP</Text> 
                            <Text style={styles.amount}>5</Text>

                            <View style={styles.buttons}>
                                <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => products.push(1)}>
                                    <Image style={styles.menu} source={maisImg}/>
                                </TouchableOpacity>       
                                <TouchableOpacity>
                                    <Image style={styles.menu} source={menosImg}/>
                                </TouchableOpacity>
                            </View>
                        </View>
                    )}
                />
            <View style={styles.total}>
                <Text style={styles.descriptionTicket}> Total</Text> 
                <Text style={styles.amountTotal}>5</Text> 
            </View>   
            <TouchableOpacity onPress={() => console.log(products)}>
                <View style={styles.menuButton} >
                    <Text style={[styles.buttonEntrar, { marginTop: 0}]} >Comprar</Text>
                </View>
            </TouchableOpacity> 
            
        </View>
        
    );
}
